abstrac: GET THE SOFTWARE SERVICES FROM THE EXPERTS TO LEAD THE CROWD
bio:
We at, Brainium Information Technologies are actually group of IT & Software expert has experience in the delivery of various kinds of web-based systems – from high-loaded, scalable and secure Software as a service to on premise corporate software solutions (automation of sales workflows, document management, cost baseline and vendor-level cost planning systems etc.). We create web applications that have multi-layered service-oriented structures which allow your business to plug in new data channels or replace different layers without any impact on the rest of the system. We are also specialist in evolutionary changes and transformation of existing legacy systems. Sometimes revolution costs too much.

If it looks bad, it is bad – This perception is a natural human response. As such, many products with great ideas behind them suffer from poor and unprofessional design. We understand the importance and value of good-looking, clean user interfaces, effective workflows and usability. We keep ourselves up to date with the latest design trends and best practices, and use them in our work.

We are available Monday to Friday 10:00 AM  IST to 8:00 PM IST.       

We are comfortable working through Milestone Payment Methods

bio:
A team of young and fresh minds came together and finally decided to extend their services to the world; thus on the 3rd of June, 2013 was born Unickcreation. Specializing in numerous fields, we cover a plethora of services. Having thus said, our focus, since the time of our inception has always been on quality and not quantity. We cover a wide range of services that encompass the broader categories of web designing, web development, graphic design, animation, SEO marketing and even logo designing. We are a one-stop shop for all the solutions for your website creation problems and queries


Our all team members are active and ready to start your work immediately within  24 hours. So let contact us for the following services.

1. Graphics & Logo Design 
2. Website Design & Web Development
-----------------------------------------------------------------
I have been in full time employment, working as a graphic designer and print manager in Creative web solution and I am now freelancing, as yet my portfolio is developing and I will be adding to it in the not too distant future.
My work has covered many fields - and I can offer design in from the more mundane design of forms, through to exciting promotional material for events, 

Please also have a look at my feedback's from my clients on guru. I really want long term and meaningful business relationship with you.

Area Covered: Design for Print and Web


-----------------------------------------------------------------
We offer affordable service with guaranteed positive effect of Admin related job and Sales Marketing Task.

Payment Method: SafePay Escrow, Safepay Invoicing

abstrac: SEO Content Writer | SaaS and eCommerce Content Expert for B2B & B2C Companies | Topic Expertise: WooCommerce Stores, WordPress Plugins, SaaS Tools
bio:
Hi,

I am Rohit - a seasoned SEO content writer with 5+ years of experience in creating engaging content that your audience & Google loves! 😃

I specialise in creating content for various domains, such as WordPress plugins for WooCommerce & SaaS tools for eCommerce (sales funnel builder, email marketing, WordPress marketing automation, etc.). 

I combine the best SEO practices & compelling content to drive organic traffic, improve user engagement, & boost search engine rankings. 📈

If you are an eCommerce seller, who sells physical or digital products, I can be your eCommerce content writer & help you create persuasive product descriptions, comprehensive product guides, comparison articles, & how-to blog posts.

If you are looking for a B2B/B2C SaaS content writer, especially for WordPress plugins, I can help you create comprehensive how-to-use guides, use-case-specific blog posts, & even WordPress plugin descriptions.

As your SEO content marketer, I can create content that captures potential users’ attention & drives sales. Due to my experience in WordPress & WooCommerce spaces, I can be your go-to expert for all your content needs on these platforms.

Let's work together to create high-quality SEO content that drives results & brings value to your audience. Drop a "hi" to discuss your content needs. 🤝

Content Expertise:

✅ How-to Guides
✅ Listicles
✅ Product Descriptions
✅ Affiliate Articles (Product Guides, Comparison Articles, etc.)
✅ Comprehensive Pillar Posts
✅ Short Responsive Posts

Industry Expertise: 

✅ WooCommerce Stores
✅ WordPress Plugins
✅ SaaS Tools (Sales Funnel Builder, Email Marketing, WordPress Marketing Automation, etc.)

Tools Expertise

✅ Keyword Research Tools - Semrush, Ahrefs, & Ubersuggest
✅ Google Tools - Google Search, Google Trends, Google Search Console, & Google Analytics
✅ Productivity Tools - Cliq, Slack, Asana, Google Sheets, & Google Docs
✅ CMS - WordPress

Work Samples

👉 https://bit.ly/3K9cEdn 👈

abstrac: Children's Book Illustrations, Book Design, Graphic Design, Packaging, Vector Tracing, Line Drawings
bio:
I will illustrate and layout your children's book for Kindle Direct Publishing, IngramSpark, Blurb etc. I have 5+ years experience in the entire process of Amazon KDP book publishing and I have prior verified experience in Book Design, Page layout, Children's books, School Books, Business Books and other fiction, non fiction books as well. As a professional children's book designer, I have the unique insight into the author aspect of getting a book published and printed. Specialize in working with Adobe Creative Suite, mostly with Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign.

I'm also skilled in creating eBook for CreateSpace in .epub format and for Amazon Kindle in .mobi format. My goal is to deliver an excellent work and make sure to meet my client's expectations. With almost 12 years of experienced in multinational graphic design companies and I've learned how to be responsible, pay attention to details, worked in tight schedule and how to treat co-associate nicely.

My specialties are:
-Character Design
-Sketching
-Layout Design
-Book covers
-3 round revision
-Geometry Diagrams
-Mathematical Diagrams
-Indusrial Diagram
-Infographics
-Image Editing, Retouching, manipulation
-Corporate Annual Reports
-Magazine cover and Layout
-Catalogue
-Brochure (All types)
-Advertisements

I am good in the following:

- Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign

and more job related software

Work Terms
1. Part time/Full Time Work
2. 30 - 40 hours weekly
3. Take both type of work i.e fixed payment & per hour
4. Free revisions with work till satisfaction
5. No extra charge to adjust the spine width based on your page count
6. Can provide print-ready PDF
7. No extra cost for a high resolution eBook cover
8. No extra cost for a 3-D mock-up of the book for marketing
9. Payment after successful completion of the work
